comments.body:
It might be good to add a comment here on runtime - the full benchmark suite took ~20 minutes to run on my machine. 

Also, though this is indeed the default way to run the benchmark suite, it's not clear how useful this command is on its own, as the results are printed to the terminal (as you mention later in the docs) and are generally not page-able.
Thanks for your carefully review, added a Note to demonstrate the runtime.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@the command line and execute::

    python runtests.py --bench

where ``--bench`` activates the benchmark suite instead of the
